title: Google Pay virtual cards will soon make your online purchases more secure
content:
Google has announced an expansion of its virtual cards in Google Pay, promising to make online purchases even more secure. In the coming months, users will be able to use virtual cards for their purchases on Android and desktop devices using Google’s Autofill, whether they have a Visa, American Express, MasterCard, or Capital One card.

The post Google Pay virtual cards will soon make your online purchases more secure appeared first on XDA.
description: You'll soon be able to keep your bank card info private by using Google Pay virtual cards. They'll start rolling out this summer in the US.
